requestBody.description: id attribute should not be filled.

parameters.name: filter[id]
parameters.description: Only return products with these `id` values.

parameters.name: filter[sku]
parameters.description: Only return products with this `sku` code.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Return at most this many results. Default and maximum values depends on shop configuration.

requestBody.description: id attribute should not be filled.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: API KEY can be generated in Admin > Settings > Api Keys section.

code.description:
Identifies a specific error condition. Intended for programmatic parsing
and will not change for a given error condition.

title.description: A short description of the problem. Intended as a helpful message to users.

detail.description:
A more detailed description of the problem. Intended as a helpful message
to developers.
detail.example: A helpful description for the developer

meta.description:
Additional information about the error. For example a list of invalid form
fields etc.

detail.example: Access token is missing or invalid

title.example: Operation cannot be performed with given resource

is_for_sale.description: If true then inventory quantities are added to productâ€™s total inventory quantity.

is_main_stock.description: Sales orders are sent to main stock. There can only be one main stock. If you set is_main_stock to true then the previous main stock will be updated and it's is_main_stock will be set to false.

status.description: Disabled locations are excluded from total inventory calculations, pickup locations etc.

external_id.description: Used to map resources between integrated system and ShopRoller. External ID is unique in the scope of an API KEY.

is_default.description: Product's main image that is displayed in catalog view.

order_decimal_places.description: Number of decimal places that can be ordered. 0-4

external_id.description: Used to map resources between integrated system and ShopRoller. External ID is unique in the scope of an API KEY.

204NoContentResponse.description: Operation successful but no content to return.
